TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptReferenceEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉譯的指令碼參考時，物件包含中定義的物件執行個體。When a script reference is rendered, the object contains the object that is defined in the instance. 您可以建立事件處理常式事件，以檢查物件，並視需要修改它。You can create an event handler for the event to check the object and modify it as needed. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示 ASP.NET Web 網頁參考名為 CustomScript.js 指令碼檔案。The following example shows an ASP.NET Web page that references a script file that is named CustomScript.js. 當 Web 應用程式裝載於 www.contoso.com 網域，[ScriptReference.Path]屬性設定為值，針對該網域。When the Web application is hosted on the www.contoso.com domain, the [ScriptReference.Path] property is set to a value specific for that domain. 事件處理常式事件會檢查主機 URL 和值變更為 [ScriptReference.Path]若有必要的屬性。An event handler for the event checks the host URL and changes the value for the [ScriptReference.Path] property if it is necessary. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Script As ScriptReference
public: property System::Web::UI::ScriptReference ^ Script { System::Web::UI::ScriptReference ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含指定碼程式庫的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the script library.

value.span: 物件，其中包含在網頁上參考的用戶端指令碼。

span.span: A object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件存放至屬性加入至屬性時就會引發事件。The object in the property is added to the property when the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 ASP.NET Web 網頁參考名為 CustomScript.js 指令碼檔案。The following code example shows an ASP.NET Web page that references a script file that is named CustomScript.js. 當 Web 應用程式裝載於 www.contoso.com 網域，[ScriptReference.Path]屬性設定為值，針對該網域。When the Web application is hosted on the www.contoso.com domain, the [ScriptReference.Path] property is set to a value specific for that domain. 事件處理常式事件會檢查主機 URL 和值變更為 [ScriptReference.Path]若有必要的屬性。An event handler for the event checks the host URL and changes the value for the [ScriptReference.Path] property if it is necessary. 物件透過擷取屬性。The object is retrieved through the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs/VB/Default.aspx#1)]
